thread.title: Lenovo launches PHAB Plus at Rs 20,990
thread.title_full: Lenovo launches PHAB Plus at Rs 20,990 | Business Standard News

author: BS Reporter
title: Lenovo launches PHAB Plus at Rs 20,990
text:
Lenovo on Monday launched PHAB Plus, a crossover between a smartphone and a tablet.

Lenovo PHAB Plus has a 6.8-inch screen. It runs on Android 5.0 and has a 3,500mAh battery. It has 4G LTW connectivity and is available in two colours of silver and grey.

The PHAB Plus has Qualcomm Snapdragon Octacore 1.5 Ghz processor supported with 2 GB RAM and 32 GB storage. It has 13 MP rear auto-focus camera and five advanced lenses, which the company say will produce sharp images even in low light conditions. It comes with a dual LED flash. In the front the PHAB Plus has a 5 MP camera with a wide angle lens.

The phone will be available in Amazon.com from Monday, in Croma and Reliance stores by October 12.

“The smartphone has become an integral companion for most of us, fitting into all aspects of our lives. As we strive to do more and achieve more, the PHAB Plus is a smart device designed to live up to users on all counts, making life more convenient especially owing to its impressive screen size. The Lenovo PHAB Plus truly combines the awesomeness of a phone and a tablet in one cool device,” said Rohit Midha, Director – Tablet Business Unit in Lenovo India.
